name: Elemental: War of Magic
description:
Elemental: War of Magic is a strategy game developed by Stardock Entertainment. It came out on 24-08-2010. It was published by Stardock Entertainment. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Elemental: War of Magic is available on PC.
Scott Tykoski produced the game. It was scored by Mason Fisher.
